scripts.export: rm -rf $npm_package_config_outputFolder && NODE_ENV=production next build && next export -o $npm_package_config_outputFolder && cp static/js/sw.js $npm_package_config_outputFolder/ && sed -i -e 's/@VERSION@/'$npm_package_version'/g' $npm_package_config_outputFolder/sw.js && rm -rf $npm_package_config_outputFolder/sw.js-e && cp $npm_package_config_outputFolder/_next/static/style.css $npm_package_config_outputFolder/static/  && rm -rf $npm_package_config_outputFolder/_next
scripts.deploy-now: npm run export && cd $npm_package_config_outputFolder && now --public --regions bru
scripts.deploy-heroku: npm run export && npm run server-static
